title: i am new to the city, and live in the historic district on chestnut and 6th. the road seems to be a main thruway for folks visiting the mini market on the corner. is there a process one would go thru to have no littering signs posted in the neighborhoods, with the fine amount, in an attempt to stop some of the waste and packaging debris that is thrown in our yards by some passersby many times a day. Maybe more of the nice brick trash receptacles located in other downtown areas?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Thanks for using MyReporter.com!  http://www.myreporter.com/?p=10842
